description: Notice of permitted development for telecommunications apparatus comprising: The removal of 3 x Commscope AQU4518R24v06 antenna at 16.69m and 3 x Commscope T4S4-90A-R2 antenna at 16.75m from the Gas Holder site. The installation of 3 x Commscope RRZZT4S4-65-R6 antenna at 16.65m and the installation of 3 x Airscale AEQC 32T32R M-MIMO antenna at 17.13m utilising the existing steelwork support structures . Ancillary works to include the installation of 4 x DC BoBs,  4 x Fibre BoBs to the rear of the antenna, 3 x RRUs plus the re use of 3 x RRUs, 3 x new Combiners and the reuse of 3 x Combiners, 3 x new  Multicore and 3 x DC cables, the removal and relocation of existing NSN Flat pack racks at ground level.
site_name: Transmitter Mast At Gas Holder StationSutherland Road AndYarnton WayErithKent
